mapper.select: select wid from tbl_user where admin_id=#{admin_id}

select d.device_id,d.device_name,d.device_sn,d.mac_grant_key,d.lmt,c.success_msg,c.fail_msg from tbl_#{wid}_device d left join tbl_#{wid}_device_config c on d.device_id=c.device_id where d.device_sn=#{device_sn} and d.lmt>#{lmt}

SELECT a.person_id,a.person_name,a.emp_number,i.blob_image base_image,a.status,a.lmt FROM (SELECT p.person_id,p.person_name,p.emp_number,p.image_id,p.status,p.lmt FROM tbl_#{wid}_person p RIGHT JOIN (SELECT person_id FROM tbl_#{wid}_grant WHERE device_id=(SELECT device_id FROM tbl_#{wid}_device WHERE device_sn=#{device_sn})) g ON p.person_id=g.person_id WHERE p.lmt>#{lmt}) a LEFT JOIN tbl_#{wid}_image i ON a.image_id=i.image_id
SELECT person_id,type,pass_number,status,pass_start_time,pass_end_time,lmt FROM tbl_#{wid}_grant WHERE device_id=(select device_id from tbl_#{wid}_device where device_sn=#{device_sn}) and lmt>#{lmt}
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_#{wid}_record(person_id,device_id,record_time,record_image,recog_type) values(#{person_id},(select device_id from tbl_#{wid}_device where device_sn=#{device_sn}),now(),#{record_image},#{recog_type})
